GV05brupsb2u:2100: sa hovācendreṇa vā uttko 'smayetaccedanyasmā anuvrūyāstata eva te śiraśchindyāmiti /
GV05brupsb2u:2101: tasmādvai bibhemi, yadvai me sa śiro na chindyāt tadvāmupaneṣya iti /
GV05brupsb2u:2102: tau hocaturāvāṃ tvā tasmāt trāsyāvahe iti kathaṃ mā trāsyethe? iti /
GV05brupsb2u:2108: atha te tadindraḥ śiraśchetsyati;atha te svaṃ śira āhratya tatte pratidhāsyāva iti /
GV05brupsb2u:2111: athāsya śiracchittvānyatropanidadhutuḥ;athāśvasya śira āhratya tadvāsya pratidadhatuḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:2114: athāsya svaṃ śira āhratya tadvāsya pratidadhaturiti /
GV05brupsb2u:2115: yāvattu pravargyakarmāṅgabhūtaṃ madhu tāvadeva tatrābhihitam, na tu kakṣyamātmājñānākhyam /
GV05brupsb2u:2116: tatra yā ākhyāyikābhihitā seha stutyarthā pradarśyate /
GV05brupsb2u:2125: sanaye lābhāya !lāmalubdho hi loke 'pi krūraṃ karmācarati, tathaivaitāvupalabhyete yathā soke /
GV05brupsb2u:2126: tadāviḥ prakāśaṃ kṛṇomi karomi yadrahasi bhavadbhayāṃ kṛtam, kimiva?
GV05brupsb2u:2128: nakārastūpariṣṭādupacāra upamārthīyo vede, na pratipedhārthaḥ;yathāśvaṃ na /
GV05brupsb2u:2130: tanyaturiva vṛrṣṭi yathā parjanyo vṛrṣṭi prakāśayati stanayitnvādiśabdaiḥ,
GV05brupsb2u:2131: tadvadahaṃ yuvayoḥ krūraṃ karma āviṣkṛṇomīti sambandhaḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:2132: nanvaśvinoḥ stutyarthau kathamimau mantrau syātāṃ nindāvacanau hīmau /
GV05brupsb2u:2134: yasmādīdṛśamapyatikrūraṃ karma kurvatoryuvayorna loma ca mīyata iti /
GV05brupsb2u:2138: tathā praśaṃsārūpā ca nindā loke prasidvā /
GV05brupsb2u:2141: yanmadhukakṣyamātmajñānalakṣaṇamāthavaṇo vāṃ yukābhyāmaśvasya śīrṣṇā śirasā prayat īm uvāca yat provāca madhu /
GV05brupsb2u:2145: idaṃ vai tan madhu dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇo 'śvibhyām uvāca |
GV05brupsb2u:2146: tad etad ṛṣiḥ paśyann avocat -- ātharvaṇāyāśvinau dadhīce 'śvyaṃ śiraḥ praty airayatam |
GV05brupsb2u:2147: sa vāṃ madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāv apikakṣyaṃ vām iti || BrhUp_2,5.17 ||
GV05brupsb2u:2152: ātharvaṇo dadhyaṅnāma, ātharvaṇo 'nyo vidyata ityato viśinaṣṭi dadhyaṅnāmātharvaṇaḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:2153: tasmai dadhīca ātharvaṇāya he 'śvināviti mantradṛśo vacanam,
GV05brupsb2u:2155: brāhmaṇasya śirasicchinne 'śvasya śiraśchittvedṛśamatikrūraṃ karma kṛtvā aśvayaṃ śiro brāhmaṇaṃ prati erayataṃ gamitavantau yuvām /
GV05brupsb2u:2156: sa cātharvaṇo vāṃ yuvābhyāṃ tanmadhu pravocad yat pūrvaṃ pratijñātaṃ vakṣyāmīti /
GV05brupsb2u:2158: śṛtāyan yata pūrvaṃ pratijñātaṃ satyaṃ tat paripālayitumicchan /
GV05brupsb2u:2161: ityucyate-tvāṣṭram, tvaṣṭā ādityastasya sambandhi, yajñasya śiraśchinnaṃ tvaṣṭābhavat,
GV05brupsb2u:2163: tatra pravargyakarmāṅgabhūtaṃ yad vijñānaṃ tattvāṣṭraṃ madhu-yajñasya śiraśchedanapratisandhānādiviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ tattvāṣṭraṃ yanmadhu he dastro,
GV05brupsb2u:2166: api ca na kevalaṃ tvāṣṭrameva madhu karmasambandhiyuvābhyāmavocat,
GV05brupsb2u:2167: api ca kakṣyaṃ gopyaṃ rahasyaṃ paramātmasambandhi yad vijñānaṃ madhu madhubrāhmaṇenottkamadhyāyadvayaprakāśitam,
GV05brupsb2u:2171: idaṃ vai tan madhu dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇo 'śvibhyām uvāca |
GV05brupsb2u:2172: tad etad ṛṣiḥ paśyann avocat -- puraś cakre dvipadaḥ puraś cakre catuṣpadaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:2173: puraḥ sa pakṣī bhutvā puraḥ puruṣa āviśad iti |
GV05brupsb2u:2174: sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsu pūrṣu puriśayaḥ |
GV05brupsb2u:2185_0: puraścakre puraḥ purāṇi śarīrāṇi yata iyamacyākṛtavyākaraṇaprakriyā sa parameśvaro
GV05brupsb2u:2185_1: nāmarūpe avyākrate vyākurvāṇaḥ prathamaṃ bhūrādīṃ llokān sṛṣṭvā cakre kṛtavāna dvipado
GV05brupsb2u:2186: tavā puraḥ śarīrāṇi cakre catuṣpadaścatuṣpādupalakṣitāni paśuśarīrāṇi /
GV05brupsb2u:2187: puraḥ purastān sa īśvaraḥ pakṣī liṅgaśarīraṃ bhūtvā puraḥ śarīrāṇipuruṣa āviśadityasyārthamācaṣṭe śrutiḥ-sa vā ayaṃ puruṣaḥ sarvāsuyūrṣu sarvaśarīreṣu puriśayaḥ,
GV05brupsb2u:2188: puriśeta iti puriśayaḥ san puruṣa ityucyate /
GV05brupsb2u:2190: tathā nainena kiñcanāsaṃvṛtamantarananupraveśitaṃ bāhyabhūtenāntarbhūtena ca na anāvṛtam /
GV05brupsb2u:2191: evaṃ sa eva nāmakhyātmanā antarvahirbhāvena kāryakaraṇarūpeṇa vyavasthitaḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:2195: idaṃ vai tan madhu dadhyaṅṅ ātharvaṇo 'śvibhyām uvāca |
GV05brupsb2u:2196: tad etad ṛṣiḥ paśyann avocat -- rūpaṃrūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva tad asya rūpaṃ praticakṣaṇāya |
GV05brupsb2u:2197: indro māyābhiḥ pururūpa īyate yuktā hy asya harayaḥ śatā daśeti |
GV05brupsb2u:2198: ayaṃ vai harayo 'yaṃ vai daśa ca sahasraṇi bahūni cānantāni ca |
GV05brupsb2u:2199: tad etad brahmāpūrvam anaparam anantaram abāhyam |
GV05brupsb2u:2206: pratirūpo 'nurūpo vā yādṛksaṃmathānau mātāpitarau tatsaṃsthānastadanurūpa eva putro jāyate /
GV05brupsb2u:2207: na hi catuṣpado dvipājjāyate dvipado vā catuṣpāt /
GV05brupsb2u:2208: sa eva hi parameśvaro nāmarūpe vyākurvāṇo rūpaṃ rūpaṃ pratirūpo babhūva /
GV05brupsb2u:2212: tadā asyātmano nirūpādhikaṃ rūpaṃ prajñānaghanākhyaṃ na pratikhyāyeta /
GV05brupsb2u:2213: yadā punaḥ kāryakaraṇātmanā nāmarūpe vyāka-te bhavataḥ, tadāsya rūpaṃ pratikhyāyeta /
GV05brupsb2u:2215: na tu paramārthataḥ; pururūpo bahurūpa īyate gabhyate,
GV05brupsb2u:2221: daśa ca prāṇibhedabāhulyācchatāna daśa ca bhavanti /
GV05brupsb2u:2225: evaṃ tahi ayamanyaḥ parameśvaro 'nye haraya ityevaṃ prāpte ucyate-ayaṃ vai harayo 'yaṃ vai daśa ca sahasrāṇi bahūni cānantāni ca prāṇibhedasyānantyāt /
GV05brupsb2u:2227: apūrvaṃ nāsya kāraṇaṃ pūrva vidyata ityapūrvam /
GV05brupsb2u:2233: yaḥ pratyagātmā draṣṭā śrotā mantā bodvā vijñātā sarvānubhūḥ,
GV05brupsb2u:2253: ayedānīṃ brahmavidyārthasya madhukāṇḍasya vaṃśaḥ stutyartho brahmavidyāyāḥ /
GV05brupsb2u:2255: tatra vaṃśa iva vaṃśaḥ yathā veṇurvaṃśaḥ parvaṇaḥ parvaṇo hi bhidyate tadvadagratprabhṛti āmūlaprāpterayaṃ vaṃśaḥ /
